title: theinvestdude
author: theinvestdude
created_time: September 28, 2022, 10:57:00 AMLast edit: October 11, 2022, 02:49:29 PM by theinvestdude
content: ★ WEBSITE ★ TELEGRAM CHANNEL ★  TELEGRAM CHANNEL ★ TWITTER ★ MASTER SPREADSHEETS ★ STAKES SPREADSHEETS BOUNTY GENERAL DETAILS1. Bounty is solely manage by Theinvestdude.2. 800,000 SKY Tokens ~ $150,000 USD will be divided to all qualified stakes accumulated for the duration of the bounty.3. Skypay Bounty Program started September 28, 2022 and will end on November 9, 2022 (6 WEEKS)4. Bounty week starts on wednesday and will end on next tuesday the following week.Disclaimer: We encourage everyone to do their research and due diligence before investing their time or money. Participating in this bountycampaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.BOUNTY GENERAL RULES1. Must follow SKYPAY Twitter: TWITTER2. Must follow SKYPAY Telegram Channel: TELEGRAM CHANNEL3. Must Join SKYPAY Telegram group: TELEGRAM GROUP4. Must Subscribe to Youtube Channel: YOUTUBE5. Must Follow Bounty Channel:Bounty Channel 6. For any question, Join our official Bounty Group:BOUNTY GROUP7. All users must post proof of authenticationQuote#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address:Weekly Report Post FormCode:Week #: Bitcointalk Username:Bitcointalk profile linkTelegram Username:[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets/Tweets Url:Retweet #1Retweet #2Retweet #3Retweet #4Retweet #5OWN TWEET #1OWN TWEET #2[b]Facebook Campaign[/b]Group Post #1Group Post #2Group Post #3Group Post #4Group Post #5PUBLIC PROFILE POST #1PUBLIC PROFILE POST #2[b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Telegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Telegram posts Url:TG post #1TG post #2TG post #3TG post #4TG post #5User Invited: @username, @username (Max of 10 Weekly)Youtube Video #1Youtube Video #2Article #1Article #2TikTok Shorts #1TikTok Shorts #2TikTok Shorts #3TikTok Shorts #4TikTok Shorts #5BOUNTY ALLOCATIONSTWITTER= 30% | FACEBOOK= 20% | YOUTUBE= 20% | ARTICLE= 10% | TELEGRAM= 10% | TIKTOK= 10%BOUNTY SCHEDULEWEEK #1 09/28/2022 - 10/04/2022= COMPLETEDWEEK #2 10/5/2022 - 10/11/2022= COMPLETEDWEEK #3 10/12/2022 - 10/18/2022 (DEADLINE OF SUBMISSION = 3:00 PM UTC)= ACTIVEGeneral Twitter Bounty Rules1. Must Follow our Twitter Account TWITTER2. Must have at least 300 real followers3. Account must be active with crypto related content4. Must use hash tags #Airdrop #SKY #SKYPAY #BSC #BinanceSmartChain #Presale #ICO5. Must Retweet 5x weekly + 2x "OWN TWEET" Weekly6. Max of 1 RT and 1 own tweet per dayRewards: 300 to 1000 Followers: 1 Stake/ RT|Tweet1001 to 3000 Followers: 2 Stakes/ RT|Tweet3001 to 10,000 Followers: 3 Stales / RT|TweetFill form to Join: SUBMITGeneral Facebook Bounty Rules1. Must have atleast 300 FB Friends/Followers2. Must use hash tags #Airdrop #SKY #SKYPAY #BSC #BinanceSmartChain #Presale #ICO3. Post 5x weekly in different crypto related facebook group about skypay4. Create 2x public post weekly on your profile regarding SKYPAY5. All post must include website linkRewards:  1 stake/postFill form to Join: SUBMITGeneral Youtube Bounty Rules1. Must Have atleast 100 Real Subcriber2. Video must be explain SKYPAY Token3. Video must be 1:20 Minutes long4. Video Description must include website,twitter and telegram links5. Add your bitcointalk username on the video descriptions6. Each user can submit 2 videos per bounty weekRewards: Upto 100 Stakes depending on engagement/views and subscribers count.Fill form to Join: SUBMITGeneral Article Bounty Rules1. Must Have atleast 100 Real Subcriber2. Article must be explain SKYPAY Token3. Article must be 500 words long4. Article must include website,twitter and telegram links5. Add your bitcointalk username on the Article foot notes6. Each user can submit 2 Article per bounty weekRewards: Upto 100 Stakes depending on engagement/viewsFill form to Join: SUBMITGeneral Telegram Bounty Rules1. Must Join & Follow Telegram Group  & Channel 2. Must post 1x Daily on official telegram group (5x max weekly)3. Must post/shill 1x Daily on other crypto related group - Don't forget to add website link or telegram link4. OPTIONAL: Add your friends/contacts on our telegram group (10x Max Weekly)Rewards: 1 Stake per post | 1 Stake/ added memberOptional Rewards: 5 Stakes Weekly = Add "SKYPAY NETWORK" on your last name fieldFill form to Join: SUBMITGeneral Tiktok Bounty Rules1. Must have atleast 30 tiktok followers2. Tiktok account must be crypto related3. Video must be atleast 20 secs long4. Must use hash tags #crypto #airdrop #skypay #fyp5. Each user can submit 1x video per day6. Each videos must reach atleast 300 views to qualify for the stakes for the duration of the bounty (6 weeks)Rewards: Upto 10 Stakes per video depending on views/quality/uniquenessOptional: Re-upload your works on FB Reels & Youtube Shorts = 1 stakes/ Re-uploadFill form to Join: SUBMIT
